_header: His body is wapped all in woe / Hand and foot he may not go
Note: For an earlier version in couplets see 3326, 3959, etc.; for other versions in quatrains see 3424 and 5653; for Kele’s version see 3424.
_description: A song of the Passion — eight quatrains and burden: ‘Mary modyr cum and se / Thi son is naylyd on a tre’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
His body is wappyd all in wohand & fot he may not
                    go…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…& bryng us to blys þat is aboneamen amen amen for
                    charite
